# XGBoost

XGBoost is a scalable and efficient gradient boosting framework that builds an ensemble of decision trees to achieve high predictive performance. It is widely used for classification and regression tasks due to its speed, accuracy, and ability to handle large datasets.

[Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/1603.02754)

[Download input data](https://github.com/zkonduit/ezkl/tree/main/examples/onnx/xgboost/input.json)
[Download model](https://github.com/zkonduit/ezkl/tree/main/examples/onnx/xgboost/network.onnx)

Download the model and input data from the above links and place them in this folder.
